data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Perambalur, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Perambalur, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Perambalur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Perambalur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Perambalur, Tamil Nadu, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kathikkaran people. Make the Kathikkaran people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, the believers in the county of Perambalur, Tamil Nadu, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Perambalur unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary:
the county of Perambalur, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 565,200.

We estimate Perambalur has 6,217 people who might know Jesus, 6,858 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 552,125 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Perambalur.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
